sentences.sContent: Install a CO detector to alert you of the presence of the deadly, odorless, colorless gas.
sentences.sContent_eng: Install a CO detector to alert you of the presence of the deadly, odorless, colorless gas.
sentences.sCn: 安装一氧化碳检测器来警告是否存在这种致命的、无色无味的气体。

sentences.sContent: Many smokeless, odorless incinerators for disposal of animal carcasses are available commercially.
sentences.sContent_eng: Many smokeless, odorless incinerators for disposal of animal carcasses are available commercially.
sentences.sCn: 市场上有许多种处理尸体的无烟、 无臭的焚尸炉出售。

sentences.sContent: Learning how to safely harness the invisible, odorless resource took some time. Many a building was blown to matchwood because of leaking gas. In 1908, a mattress factory exploded.
sentences.sContent_eng: Learning how to safely harness the invisible, odorless resource took some time. Many a building was blown to matchwood because of leaking gas. In 1908, a mattress factory exploded.
sentences.sCn: 学习如何安全使用这种无形、无味的资源需要时间。很多建筑因为漏气而被炸成碎片。1908年，一家床垫厂发生爆炸。

remMethod.val: 来自odor(n. 气味， 香气)

words.tran: 臭的，散发气味的；芬芳的
洒香水于；给…添味，给…加臭味

trans.tranCn: 无嗅的， 没有气味的
